data.text: @SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter This terrorist regime has ended in the minds of all Iranians, and infinite anger is surging within the Iranian people. Don't waste your time and the time of the Iranian people. They only think about destroying and killing you, nothing less.

@SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter If you do not act today to liberate Iran, tomorrow will be too late and you will be a loser forever. The Shia terrorists in Iran have already planned to assassinate you and this will definitely happen. The Shia terrorists have already saved billions of dollars to kill you.

@SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter The time to legitimize the murderous Khamenei regime after the people's revolution is over. By legitimizing it, not only the lives of Iranians but also your own and your people's lives will be at risk of physical destruction and elimination at the hands of cannibals.

@SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter Thousands of Iranian children were killed by bastard, stateless Shiite terrorists in Iran. Thousands of young men and women injured in Iranian hospitals have had their heads cut off with knives on hospital beds. Can you come to an agreement with this religious fascist group?
@SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter Can we please pass the same act and get those RINO’s  on board? This is ridiculous now. Absolutely absurd.

@SenTedCruz @DC_Reporter Dear Mr. Trump,
As an oppressed Iranian, act now on your promises: Strike Tehran's head of the snake and save us. Ayatollahs mean endless crimes. This bold hit makes you history's "Man of Peace." World awaits your win – do it!
Thanks,
[Your Name]
